abstract: The Icon 4x4 Bronco, based on Ford's renowned yet flawed proto-S.U.V., will be a highlight of the SEMA Show, running Nov. 1 to 5 in Las Vegas.
snippet: The Icon 4x4 Bronco, based on Ford's renowned yet flawed proto-S.U.V., will be a highlight of the SEMA Show, running Nov. 1 to 5 in Las Vegas.

headline.main: The Birth of a '66 Bronco, by Way of the 21st Century
